concept.title: 14.203-2 Dissemination of information concerning invitations for bids.

conbody.p: Procedures concerning display of invitations for bids in a public place, information releases to newspapers and trade journals, paid advertisements, and synopsizing through the Governmentwide point of entry (GPE) are set forth in 5.101 and subpartÂ 5.2 .
